pullrequest.title: Add QUIET to find_package() to avoid warnings when ROS not installed.

content.raw: @nkoenig @gerkey I realized that one needs to source the setup.sh from ROS before to build gazebo in order to have the proper CMAKE_PREFIX_PATH adjusted with ROS cmake modules path. I will change our jenkins scripts to do it.
content.html: @nkoenig @gerkey I realized that one needs to source the setup.sh from ROS before to build gazebo in order to have the proper CMAKE_PREFIX_PATH adjusted with ROS cmake modules path. I will change our jenkins scripts to do it.
